message: Create LICENSE
Fix chart resizing to fit viewport width and avoid frequent rerendering.
On page load, expand controls only if there is plenty of vertical space.
Refine chart controls UI layout.
For the hosted version, add functionality to create and open links to specific ESE items.
Add rendering for BPM and HS changes.
Add Gogo Time rendering.
Update version to 0.3.1.
Add footer and changelog.
ESE search results includes title matches.
Update README.
Slight adjustment of ballon number positioning.
Fix sticky chart options, make it collapsed by default, fix some tests.
Fix note selection hit detection offset caused by chart header.
Use system share sheet for TJA/image export where available.
Support saving the rendered chart as image.
Add header to rendered chart for properties such as title.
Update version to 0.3.
Add functionality to load from ESE database. Database is downloaded to host before build time.
Add annotation coloring based on hand inference.
Add basic hand annotation functionality.
Update version to 0.2.
Add looping support to TJA export, fix timing logic, and improve error handling
Add basic note selection export functionality.
Update test snapshots for darwin environment
More realistic judgement class simulation from test stream.
Restore missing gameplay initialization logic and update test snapshots.
Fix a bug where the chart may disappear at high zoom level.
Basic zh-CN language support.
Support selecting a range of notes.
Add basic note selection functionality.
Update config for v0.1 release.
Refactor view options parameters into a single object.
Add judgement display mode that puts text above notes.
Add display option functionality to zoom in/out the chart.
Toggle display of judgement for each class separately. Toggle for note stats panel. Button for display options expand/collapse.
Rearrange files for more isolated webpage output.
Smarter chart bar line wrapping given non standard MEASURE values.
Display options UI refinements.
Refine data source control UI.
Use 5 workers for Playwright tests.
Option to color note judgements with gradient color mapping from delta.
Color "all delta" values.
App packaging into executable using neutralinojs.
New view mode to display judgement results as bars underline.
Ballon rendering.
Allow manual selection of loop iteration in collapsed mode.
Scale bar width rendered with MEASURE commands in TJA.
Rearrange test cases.
UI refinements. Sticky view options and note stats panel.
Fix BPM and HS display when there is a change within the same bar.
Merge branch 'main' of https://github.com/jack9966qk/TJAAnalyzer
Fix BPM and SCROLL parsing.
Fix BPM and SCROLL parsing.
Note stats UI refinements. Add BPM and HS display.
Basic note status display on hover.
Basic loop detection and collapsing.
Add proper difficulty selection and fix some tests.
Change default port to 2354!
Fix blurry rendering.
Render bar numbers and slightly adjust elements sizing.
Minor UI polish.
TJA loading from manually picked file, or from the game start event.
Improved drumroll (yellow capsule) rendering.
Update judgement style with fill colors. More helpful judgement snapshot image.
Basic judgement listening and rendering support.
Fix notes draw ordering near barline. Align not positioning with barline.
Make bar height and note size scale with bar width.
Update bar background color and add note black border.
Basic rendering tests with snapshot functionality.
Rewrite in TypeScript.
Initial commit
